website_summaries.verdict: A quality case with a removable battery pack that can be used to charge 2 phones at once.
pros: We loved the extra USB port on this case – making it possible to charge 2 phones at once
Again, we loved that this case used the same iPhone charger, instead of a micro-USB charger
The buttons remain uncovered on this case for easy access
Once the magnetic battery pack is removed, you are left with a sleek, aesthetically pleasing case
cons: The magnetic battery pack adds a lot of extra thickness

customer_reviews.title: Works well/ 12/18 stops providing continuous charge.
customer_reviews.text: When I don't need to charge, the battery fits well in my purse and is easy to find. When I need a charge I just pull it out and charge it keeps my phone charged for 2 days.. (I don't use my phone much and I always keep it on battery saving mode) Don't over charge it will heat up. 12/18 I have to keep checking to see if it is charging my phone if it is not I have to remove the external battery and put it back on. This started to occur last week, but I was to lazy to write the updated review.
